      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      boolean ShutdownHandler.removeHook(ShutdownHook hook)

    • Uses of ShutdownHook in net.cloud.client.event.shutdown.hooks

      Classes in net.cloud.client.event.shutdown.hooks that implement ShutdownHook 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileServerShutdownHook
      This hook will stop the file server.
      class  GraphicShutdownHook
      This hook will stop a CloudGfx system from drawing.
      class  LoggerShutdownHook
      A shutdown hook which will stop the Logger service.
      class  NettyShutdownHook 
      class  TaskEngineShutdownHook
      A ShutdownHook designed to stop the task engine.
